doc.title: DuckTales: The Movie Special
doc.plot: Kadeem Hardison from "Different World, A" (1987) [TV-Series 1987-1993] and Tracey Gold of "Growing Pains" (1985) [TV-Series 1985-1992] co-host this primetime television special to promote "Ducktales: The Movie - Treasure Of The Lost Lamp" (1990) through a series of clips from the movie and from previous episodes of the popular "Ducktales" television series.
